about_app:
# NaturaList

## A flexible checklist app

![NaturaList logo](img/icon_transparent_blue.svg)

**NaturaList** is a flexible taxonomic checklist app capable of visualizing a wide variety of data for both formal and indigenous / folk taxonomies with powerful filtering and search capacities.

**NaturaList** doesn't come with a pre-defined set of taxonomic data you would have to fit your project in. You have the freedom to define what kind of data gets displayed and how. Your taxonomy data is pulled from a spreadsheet, making updates, change of appearance or even adding new kinds of information easy, without the need for extensive IT expertise and complex software packages.

**NaturaList** has been originally developed for the [Checklist of the vascular flora of Vanuatu](https://pvnh.net) under the **Plants mo Pipol blong Vanuatu** (Plants and People of Vanuatu) project.

## Get NaturaList

Visit [naturalist.netlify.app](https://naturalist.netlify.app/) for more details about NaturaList app including its latest version and a demo implementation.

Read the [app documentation](./docs/) to see how to build or manage your own checklist.

## How to cite the app

D.M. Ramík. 2022. NaturaList, a flexible taxonomic checklist app. (version {0})

## Contact the author

Dominik M. Ramík, [dominik.ramik{'@'}seznam.cz](mailto:dominik.ramik{'@'}seznam.cz)
free_text_search: Full-text search; use {0} between terms to find either one
copy_taxa_dropdown: Copy {0} taxa results of this search
nothing_found_checklist: We searched the world for you, but found nothing that matches your query
temporary_filter: Simplified view showing only taxa down to {0} level.
draft_notice: You are viewing a draft version of the checklist only visible to you. Click on Manage to manage the data or refresh the page to show the current published data.
show_about: Do you want to read about this checklist?
generic_about: This checklist has been created using NaturaList app
data_upload_waiting: Start by uploading a spreadsheet containing your checklist and all the necessary settings.
starting_from_scratch: Starting from a scratch? Download a blank spreadsheet and read the documentation to see how to fill it in with your own data.
starting_from_scratch_links: Starting from scratch or need a reference? Download the blank checklist data spreadsheet using the button below and read the documentation to see how to fill it in with your own data.
useful_links: You may also check out the [NaturaList web](https://naturalist.netlify.app/) and our [GitHub repo](https://github.com/dominik-ramik/naturalist) for more information
review_draft: Check the draft version of your updated checklist. You can go back to search, verify the data and come back by clicking on the Manage button.
data_upload_import_dirty: Some problems with your spreadsheet to be addressed before you can proceed:
click_to_upload: Click to upload a checklist spreadsheet
or_drag_it: or drag and drop it here
fresh_install_welcome_message: Looks like a fresh NaturaList here. Glad to have you onboard. May your taxonomic tree grow to the sky!
no_data: There is no data yet in this checklist. Publish your data using this form.
update_published: The update has been published and will be available shortly to your users
new_version_available: A new version of NaturaList is available. Click on this message to refresh the page and complete the update.
enter_creds_to_publish: Enter your user name and password and publish the updated checklist so that everyone can see it.
download_for_manual_update: You can download the checklist data file and use it for a manual update if you use a static web hosting, or keep it for archivation purposes. No change will be done to the currently published checklist unless you upload the data file to the **usercontent/data** folder on your site. See the [documentation](https://naturalist.netlify.app/) for more information.
chose_a_file: You need to chose a file
wrong_filetype: Wrong file type. You need to upload an Excel spreadsheet (extension .xlsx)
upload_disabled: Direct upload has been disabled by the administrator (or you are experiencing a temporary issue with connectivity). You may opt for downloading the data and manually upload them to the server e.g. through FTP.
this_may_take_time: Relax. This may take some time, especially if your spreadsheet has thousands of entries.
server_returned_odd_message: The server returned an unexpected response. You may need to change the configuration of your PHP server or contact the author of this app.
offline_fetch_failed: Could not load some resources from the network. Are you offline?
include_match_children: Show child taxa of taxa that match the filters
numeric_filter_select: Select one of the operations above
check_assets_size1: Verify the size of linked media files
check_assets_size2: Verify the size of linked media files during spreadsheet upload to make sure they are not too large. This may take some time if your checklist contains links to many media files.
dm_array_with_empty_cells_in_the_middle: Check the column {0}{1} of the following row in the checklist sheet. There should be no empty cell at that index: {2}
dm_cannot_have_language_indicators: Column {0} in table {1} cannot have language indicators ({2})
dm_specify_fallback_language: Language {0} in table {1} (sheet {2}) doesn not have any existing fallback language, enter on of the following language codes into the fallback language column to ensure proper displaying, or else the application interface will fall back to English
dm_cannot_load_languages: Cannot load language table from sheet {0}
dm_cannot_find_sheet: Cannot find the sheet {0} in your file
dm_verify_doc: Verify the documentation to be on the same page with the latest format of the configuration sheets.
dm_column_defined_but_missing: Column {0} is defined in the {1} table but it is missing in your checklist sheet; you need to add it into the checklist sheet or remove it from the {2} table
dm_column_names_duplicate: Multiple columns in the checklist sheet have the header {0}, only one column should be called so in order to avoid ambiguities
dm_incomplete_taxa_info_row: In checklist sheet on line {0} review the content of taxa columns (in particular {1}); each line should have a complete set of taxonomic units from the topmost down to the level you choose, but the levels in between need to be filled
dm_defined_column_not_present: You defined column {0} in the table {1} (sheet {2}), but the column is not present in the checklist spreadsheet; this could only occur if the value of the column was not used and the column relied on a template using only data of other columns (which is not this case)
dm_media_column_names: Error in column names for media {0} in the checklist sheet; you need to use either a single column called {1} with the media source in it, or two columns called {2} and {3} in which the media source and title is put respectively
dm_taxon_column_names: Error in column names for taxon {0} in the checklist sheet; you need to use either a single column called {1} with the taxon name in it, or two columns called {2} and {3} in which the taxon name and authority is put respectively
dm_image_column_names: Error in column names for image {0} in the checklist sheet; you need to use either a single column called {1} with the imagr source in it, or two columns called {2} and {3} in which the image source and title is put respectively
dm_value_cannot_be_empty: Value in column {0} in table {1} cannot be empty
dm_incorrect_list: Incorrect value {0} in column {1} (table {2}); allowed values are: {3}
dm_incorrect_simple_column_name: Incorrect value {0} in column {1} (table {2}); The column name should only be composed of lowercase or uppercase letters without accents
dm_incorrect_hlsa: Incorrect value {0} in column {1} (table {2}); The value should be a color in CSS notation (name, rgb, rgba, hsl or hsla)
dm_incorrect_filename: Incorrect value {0} in column {1} (table {2}); The value should be a filename (allowed extensions: {3})
dm_incorrect_http: Incorrect value {0} in column {1} (table {2}); The value should be a valid URL begining with HTTP or HTTPS
dm_regex_failed: Incorrect value {0} in column {1} (table {2}). The value should be formatted as follows: {3}. It has to satisfy the following regular expression: {4}
dm_incorrect_datapath: Incorrect value {0} in column {1} (table {2}); The column name should be a valid data path (see documentation)
dm_incorrect_must_be_unique: Value {0} in column {1} in table {2} must be unique, appearing only once in the column
dm_column_name_duplicate: Column name {0} in table {1} is a duplicate already used in table {2}, you need to rename one or the other as all column names must be unique
dm_hue_value: The hue in table {0} under item 'Color theme hue' has to be an integer number between 0 and 360
dm_wrong_placement: {0} cannot be in placement {1}; only its root ({2}) should have its placement asigned
dm_wrong_template: Column {0} cannot have a template assigned, this can be only done for column names representing a simple value, with no child items
dm_wrong_badge: Column {0} cannot have 'badge' format set in {1} column, this can be only done for column names representing a simple value, with no child items
dm_wrong_separator: Column {0} cannot have a separator set in {1} column, this can be only done for column names representing a simple value, with no child items
dm_hidden_column_name: Column {0} is set to be hidden, the value of column {1} won't have any effect
dm_hidden_missing_index: You are missing index {0} in your {1} table in column {2}
dm_column_not_found: Could not find column {0} in table {1}
dm_duplicate_segment: Reading checklist data, there is a duplicity in {0}
dm_value_not_number: Value {0} in column {1} of checklist data should be a number
dm_asset_too_large: The linked file {0} is too large with {1} MB (over the expected {2} MB)
dm_asset_not_found: The linked file {0} is not found on the server
dm_asset_head_error: The linked file {0} is not found on the server or has wrong format
dm_total_precache_size_too_large: Total precache size {0} MB exceeds the configured maximum of {1} MB. Consider compressing your assets or increasing the limit in the configuration.
dm_empty_row_in_data: Empty row detected in sheet '{0}' at line {1}.
dm_data_after_empty_row_ignored: Data found after the empty row will be ignored.
dm_hidden_syntax: The column 'Hidden' in 'Custom data definition' on line {0} has incorrect syntax {1}. It should start with 'if' or 'unless'
dm_hidden_syntax_wrong_operator: The column 'Hidden' in 'Custom data definition' on line {0} has incorrect syntax {1}. The filter name should be followed by any of the following keywords 'is', 'isset', 'notset', 'notsetor'
dm_hidden_syntax_wrong_filter: The column 'Hidden' in 'Custom data definition' on line {0} has incorrect syntax {1}. The filter name should be a valid data path and correspond to a Column name with Search category title set
dm_hidden_syntax_wrong_length: The column 'Hidden' in 'Custom data definition' on line {0} has incorrect syntax {1}.
dm_hidden_syntax_wrong_value: The column 'Hidden' in 'Custom data definition' on line {0} has incorrect syntax {1}. The list of values should be separated by commas and enclosed in double quotes
dm_markdown_file_not_found: The markdown file {0} is not found on the server. It is referenced in the column {1} of the checklist data on row {2}
dm_precache_absolute: Media {0} has is set to precache but its 'Link base' is an absolute address {1}. Media with Precache set to 'yes' must have 'Link base' set to an URL relative to 'usercontent' folder
dm_fdirective_backslash: Invalid F: path: backward slashes (\) are not allowed in file paths: {0}. The path must be relative to the *usercontent* folder. Example of valid path: *about* (the .md extension is inferred) or *docs/about.md*
dm_fdirective_absolute_or_dot_slash: Invalid F: path: absolute paths or paths starting with '/' or './' are not allowed: {0}. The path must be relative to the *usercontent* folder. Example of valid path: *about* (the .md extension is inferred) or *docs/about.md*
dm_fdirective_directory_traversals: Invalid F: path: directory traversal (..) is not allowed: {0}. The path must be relative to the *usercontent* folder. Example of valid path: *about* (the .md extension is inferred) or *docs/about.md*
dm_fdirective_invalid_path: Invalid F: path: the path contains invalid characters or structure: {0}. The path must be relative to the *usercontent* folder. Example of valid path: *about* (the .md extension is inferred) or *docs/about.md*
dm_fdirective_invalid_url: Invalid F: URL or not same origin: {0} ({1})
dm_details_formatting_invalid: Column {0} has placement 'details' but formatting '{1}'. Only '', 'text', 'markdown', 'image', 'sound', 'map', or 'map regions' are allowed for placement 'details'. (Current placement: '{2}')
dm_details_with_children_invalid: Column {0} has placement 'details' but also has dependent columns: {1}. For placement 'details', the column must be a simple value and not have any child columns.
view_cat_click_on_cell: Click on a cell to get an explanation on its data
view_cat_category_verb_taxon: {0} of taxa belonging to a particular {1} category
view_cat_category_verb_category: Contribution of individual taxa to each {0} category
view_map_verb_filter: What percentage of all taxa for which {0} is found in each region
view_map_verb_region: What percentage of each region's taxa fits {0}
view_map_verb_total: What percentage of all taxa fits {0} in each region
view_map_verb_filter_all: What percentage of all the taxa is found in each region
view_map_verb_region_all: What regions are covered by checklist taxa
view_map_verb_total_all: What percentage of all the taxa is found in each region
view_map_no_filter: Tip: Use the filter to explore how are the results distributed throgh the map
dm_generic_column_names: Error in column names for formatting of type {0} in the checklist sheet; we expect either a single column called {1} or multiple columns with the following suffixes: {2}. Also check you don't have the column {3} empty while filling-in the other columns
dm_duplicate_taxon_path: Duplicate taxon path '{0}' — first seen at row {1}, repeated at row {2}. Each taxon path should be unique in the checklist.
dm_duplicate_specimen_id: Duplicate specimen ID '{0}' — first seen at row {1}, repeated at row {2}. Specimen IDs must be globally unique.
dm_specimen_must_be_last_taxon: In 'Taxa definition', taxon level 'specimen' (column '{0}') must be the last taxon column, but '{1}' comes after it.
